Files Headings

local.html
¶ 
<!DOCTYPE html>
¶

This page displays a widget which pulls its stories from the Shopware 5 CI magazine. It is intended for testing purposes only.

 

<html>
    <head>
        <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8">
        <title>Styla Cards Widget Demo</title>
        <style>
            body
            {
                text-align:             center;
                margin:                 0 auto;
                background:             #eee;
                height:                 100vh;
            }

            .styla-widget__target,
            .styla-widget__target2
            {
                text-align:             left;
                background:             #FFF;
                box-shadow:             3px 3px 0px #ccc;
                height:                 24em;
                top:                    5%;
                position:               relative;
                display:                inline-block;
                margin:                 0 1em;
            }
        </style>
    </head>
    <body>
        <h1>Stage widget</h1>
        <p>Displaying stories from <a href="http://oxid.stage.eu.magalog.net/magazine/">http://oxid.stage.eu.magalog.net/magazine/</a> </p>

        <h2>Non minified version</h2>
        <div class="styla-widget__target" style="width: 90%;"></div>
        <script src="./stories.js"></script>
        <script>
            new StylaWidget_Cards( {
                newTab  : true,
                slug    : 'ci-oxid4',
                api     : 'http://stage.magalog.net',
                target  : '.styla-widget__target',
                limit   : 4,
                cta     : 'Read more'
            } );
        </script>

        <h2>Minified version</h2>
        <div class="styla-widget__target2" style="width: 90%;"></div>
        <script src="./stories.v2.min.js"></script>
        <script>
            new StylaWidget_Tiles( {
                newTab  : true,
                slug    : 'ci-oxid4',
                api     : 'http://stage.magalog.net',
                target  : '.styla-widget__target2',
                limit   : 4,
            } );
        </script>
    </body>
</html>
